alert.note: Alert for Bertie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BERTIE COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 536 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Lewiston Woodville, or 8 miles northwest of Windsor, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Bertie County, including the following locations... Republican, Kelford, Burden, Buena Vista, Connaritsa, and Askewville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
